speaker: Doctor
text: Can you describe the red bumps you've developed on your skin? Are they itchy, painful, or do they have any other characteristics?

speaker: Patient
text: They're itchy, and they're really tender to the touch, like if you scratch them, the redness spreads a bit further.

speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me more about the timing of these red bumps? When did they first appear, and have they been growing in size or changing color over time?

speaker: Patient
text: They started appearing about 3 days ago, and they've been getting bigger and more noticeable every day. The color is a deep reddish hue, and they seem to be concentrated mostly in the right thigh area, but I've also noticed a few on my left leg and forearm.
